content:
Sure! Here's how you can extract the constants from the `X` class into an enum named `Forgery`:

```java
public enum Forgery {
    LEFT,
    RIGHT,
    CENTERED,
    JUSTIFIED
}
```

This enum represents the same set of constants as the original class `X`.
